title: Baklava Palmiers with Chocolate Pecan
instructions: Mix pecans, sugar, and cinnamon. Unfold pastry and drizzle with honey. Sprinkle with pecan mixture. Roll both short sides to meet in center. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Slice into 1/2 inch rounds. Place on parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake at 400° for 12-15 minutes until golden. Cool completely. Drizzle with melted chocolate.
